question: [Calm] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.

qas.question: [Calm] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.
[Note] English: Tell which category has the lowest bar from the bar chart.
[Review] Nederlands: Geef what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars vanuit het staafdiagram.
